channel.title: Welcome to My Homepage
channel.subtitle: Now, I'm working on my PhD application.
channel.description: I am a graduate student specializing in AI and AGI, currently applying for a Ph.D. program.

item.title: I am applying for a PhD, and this is my CV.
Simplified Meta-Transfer to Improve Exploration of Reinforcement Learning
Unsupervised RL to Continual RL
Shanghai Qi Zhi, Robot Motion Planning
item.description: <p>I am currently interning at the Institute for Interdisciplinary Information Sciences (IIIS) at Tsinghua University and the Shanghai Qi Zhi Institute. My advisor is Assistant Professor Jianyu Chen from the IIIS at Tsinghua University. Our research group is dedicated to studying embodied AGI. My research focuses on solving motion planning problems for dexterous hands in complex, long-term tasks.</p>

item.title: Adaptive Evolution and Evaluation of Secure and Confident Intelligent Systems.
Siamese Network-Driven Unsupervised RL
Unsupervised Reinforcement Learning for Multi task Autonomous Driving
Self-Evolving Learning-Based Autonomous Driving System
Mechanical Design at JLU Racing, Jilin University.
I, and JLU Racing, Jilin University.
